name: Downward Dungeon
description:
This is the first game I have made for the public.

This is a game about going down the depths of a dungeon. The further down you go, the higher the score you receive. However, it isn't as easy as it sounds. There is an angry skeleton that does not like you exploring his resting place. As you descend the dungeon, be prepared to escape from the skeleton and get as far as you can in Downward Dungeon!

Warning: There is a flashing light.
